Name: Ace of Space
About the game: Ace of Space is a intense space survival game which is made to cater to many aspects of great space shooters including: A full roster of 6 unique ships with different handing and speed. A variety of weapons to choose from before each battle. 3 beautiful maps which come at a small, medium and large sizes. Epic boss fights for the Top Ace pilots to take on. A full leveling system which will unlock you ships and weapons throughout playing. Split screen and shared screen play for you and your friend to vs each other! Full controller support! Epic sound effects will have you feel like you are right in the action at all times! Get it for only 1USD! There is no downside
